bibl.title: A First Century Archive from Oxyrhynchos or Oxyrhynchite Loan Contracts and Egyptian Marriage.
bibl.note: Discussion on one particular feature of the Family Archive of Pausiris: the marriage loans from wives to husbands reflect an influence of Egyptian marriage practice. - P. 200: edition of P. Mich. Inv. 92. Marriage loan, Dec. 27, 73 - Jan. 25, 74. - Pp. 201-204: App. II. Overview of the archive.

bibl.title: Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond

bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos, Ludwig KOENEN and Brad E. McNELLEN, A First Century Archive from Oxyrhynchos or Oxyrhynchite Loan Contracts and Egyptian Marriage.
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 181-205, 1 arbre généal., 1 tabl. et 1 pl.

Discussion on one particular feature of the Family Archive of Pausiris: the marriage loans from wives to husbands reflect an influence of Egyptian marriage practice. - P. 200: edition of P. Mich. Inv. 92. Marriage loan, Dec. 27, 73 - Jan. 25, 74. - Pp. 201-204: App. II. Overview of the archive.
